activities:
Management consulting services delivered to firms in industries including energy, financial services and other.

We collect the e-mail addresses and certain personally identifiable information of those who communicate with us via e-mail or during other standard forms of business correspondence. We also collect certain information regarding which pages our visitors access or visit, and information volunteered by the visitors (such as any surveys Corios might conduct).
personaldata: Organization, client; some information is manually processed
